sentences.sContent: Heart disease is one of the commonest causes of death.
sentences.sCn: 心脏病是最常见的死因之一。

sentences.sContent: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.sCn: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。

sentences.sContent: ...Teams work best if their members have a strong common culture...
...The academics identify five traits that are common to the disruptive innovators: questioning...
...Melanomas are more common if you have periodic intense exposure to the sun...
...It is undeniable that this has been a common scene and the overuse of computers has aroused great concern...
...What does the speaker say helps relieve the symptoms of common headaches...
...quiet and fresh air stop many common headaches...
...Break the tension with smiles and humor to reinforce the idea that this is friendly discourse and that all are working toward a common goal...
...The common prescription is to primarily shop the grocery store...
...It's pretty much common sense: you want to buy food...

synos.tran: 共同的；普通的；一般的；通常的

phrases.pCn: （争论双方的）共同基础；一致之处
共同事业；共同目标协会；偶然原因；普通原因
n. 常识；大家都知道的事
[化]常用名；普通名称；普通名词

words.tran: 平民；自费学生；下议院议员

trans.tranOther: happening often and to many people or in many places
